title: Weird Hill
alt: I'm compromising by picking a weird hill to lie on.
transcript:
[Cueball, frustrated, is sitting on a chair in front of a computer and Beret Guy pulling the chair back]
Beret Guy: Why pick a weird hill to die on...[Cueball gets up, still frustrated]
[Cueball and Beret Guy leave the room][Cueball and Beret Guy climbing a hill][Cueball and Beret Guy lying down at the top of a hill]
Beret Guy: ... when you could pick a soft hill to lie on?
Cueball: This is nice.
